job_history.work_description: Provided Advisory & Execution to Corporate & Institutional clients across Foreign Exchange, Interest Rates & Commodities products in line with their Credit & Risk profile. Reviewed clients' accounts and results regularly to determine whether life changes, economic developments or financial performance indicated a need for plan revision. Analyzed financial information obtained from clients to determine strategies for meeting clients' financial & risk management objectives.

Trading responsibilities included market making & proprietary trading in spot (USD/INR) & G7 currencies in the inter-bank market and also internal sales team. Manage the INR risk and liquidity funding book in coordination with the money market desk. Monitoring of the Net Open Position (NOP) and Aggregate Gap Limit (AGL) limits for the bank.

Provide Advisory & Execution capabilities to manage Foreign Exchange & Interest Rate hedging flows for clients across the Corporate Coverage Group. Managing a team of two traders to run the High Frequency trading desk for top tier clients based on Technical & Fundamental analysis. Generate & manage Fx flows by working closely with the trade finance, cash management and the Institutional Client group.

education.level: Post Graduate Diploma in Business Administration

skills.name: Financial Risk Management
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in managing financial risks for clients across various products, including foreign exchange, interest rates, and commodities, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Foreign Exchange Trading
skills.explanation: Over 8 years of experience in trading foreign exchange, including market making and proprietary trading, demonstrating expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Interest Rate Management
skills.explanation: Provided advisory and execution services to clients for interest rate products, showing strong proficiency in interest rate management.

skills.name: Commodities Trading
skills.explanation: Provided advisory and execution services to clients for commodities products, indicating strong proficiency in commodities trading.

skills.name: Portfolio Management
skills.explanation: Managed clients' accounts and results regularly to determine whether life changes, economic developments or financial performance indicated a need for plan revision, suggesting strong proficiency in portfolio management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed teams of traders and provided advisory services to clients, indicating strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
